entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Bonavista

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 12:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: SSE 66 km/h gust 86 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind becoming south 40 gusting to 70 early in the morning then southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
